name: DungeonEscape
description:
In this game, you will be playing and making decisions as an adventurer. You start off by waking up with no memory of how you got where you are, the only thing you remember is your name. You wake up locked in a dark room which feels like a cell. You where captured by a dangerous human and have to fight him and win to get out of that dungeon and therefore win the game in a text game setting, failure to do so you will die and never see daylight again.

  Theme:  Its a medieval theme

  Actions:  The player can attack, defend, evade attacks and also heal using coins and potions from his/her inventory (They do finish so use them wisely).
